customAmountOptions.message: provides shelter, meals and care for {{n}} people
customAmountOptions.messageSingular: provides shelter, meals and care for 1 person

customContent:
No one should be hungry, cold and alone, especially during the holidays.

$12 a month provides shelter, meals, showers, clothing and other care â€” everything a person suffering from homelessness needs to start the journey toward a new life.

Your gift today gives hope to so many people in our community, as well as the first steps to a second chance in life.

If your gift exceeds $36 a month or a $250 one time gift, you can receive one or more $20 gift cards to Fred Meyer! Be aware that the tax-deductible portion of your gift is reduced by the total face value of any gift cards you receive. Learn more about gift cards.
